books.title: The Devil’s Pool
books.author: George Sand
books.summary: The father-in-law of a young widower seeks to find him a new wife.

books.title: The Square Emerald
books.author: Edgar Wallace
books.summary: Scotland Yard’s first female investigator sets out to prove the innocence of a convicted forger.

books.title: Personal Memoirs of Ulysses S. Grant
books.author: Ulysses S. Grant
books.summary: One of the greatest generals of the United States tells the story of his life and details his key role in winning the Civil War.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: Ozma of Oz
books.author: L. Frank Baum
books.summary: A girl gets whisked away to a fairy land and helps restore the proper rulers to the throne.

books.title: A Damsel in Distress
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A composer meets a young woman and tracks her down to a country manor, where a case of mistaken identity leads to comedy.

books.title: Henry VI, Part II
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Henry VI marries Margaret of Anjou and further stokes discord within his court.

books.title: The Charwoman’s Shadow
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A young nobleman becomes a magician to secure his sister’s marriage.

books.title: The League of the Scarlet Pimpernel
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A collection of short stories featuring the Scarlet Pimpernel.

books.title: The Return
books.author: Walter de la Mare
books.summary: After visiting a graveyard, a man finds his appearance has mysteriously changed.

books.title: The Life of Buffalo Bill
books.author: William F. Cody
books.summary: The 1879 autobiography of William F. Cody, more commonly known as Buffalo Bill, detailing his early life in the American West.

books.title: The Wrong Letter
books.author: Walter S. Masterman
books.summary: A superintendent and an sleuth attempt to solve a locked-room mystery.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: Darkwater
books.author: W. E. B. Du Bois
books.summary: A collection of essays, short fiction, and poetry related to the lives of black people in Jim Crow-era America.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: John Keats
books.summary: A collection of John Keats’ published poems, and a selection of unpublished fragments and posthumous verse.

books.title: Main Street
books.author: Sinclair Lewis
books.summary: An ambitious young woman chafes against the constraints of small-town America.

books.title: The Moon Maid
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: A young man travels to the moon with a group of companions and discovers that it’s inhabited; in subsequent centuries, reincarnations of the same man deal with an invasion of the Earth by the malevolent inhabitants of the Moon.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Edgar Allan Poe
books.summary: A collection of Edgar Allan Poe’s short fiction, ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Festus
books.author: Philip James Bailey
books.summary: A man goes on a quest for knowledge, truth, and understanding in the face of the complexities of existence and spirituality.

books.title: On a Chinese Screen
books.author: W. Somerset Maugham
books.summary: A collection of short vignettes about the people and places W. Somerset Maugham encountered during his travels along the Yangtze River in 1919–20.
